name: sjd-css-framework
description: Simple, lightweight CSS framework to use in future projects.

scripts.scss: node-sass --output-style compressed src/style.scss > dist/style-min.css && node-sass --output-style expanded src/style.scss > dist/style.css
scripts.build:css: npm test && npm run scss && npm run autoprefixer
scripts.watch: npm run build && parallelshell 'npm run serve' 'npm run watch:css'

author: Sam Davis <sam@sjd.co>
